title: display connection and cross summoner pings
body:
i want to know if riot have thought about or are planning to add connection and ping display. ex.. press TAB in game and see all summoner connections and pings or only see teammates. Makes sense as 3 quarters of the players on this game dont understand the difference between lagg and "shit,noob,etc",for instance you are lagging and you let the team down some how....
